pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Provides support for parsing and emitting Yaml documents.
This package includes the full libyaml C library version 0.1.12 by Kirill Simonov (<http://pyyaml.org/wiki/LibYAML>) in the package so you don't need to worry about any non-Haskell dependencies.

flag.use: Use system libyaml instread on generic one
